verses.verse: And <WG2532> he entered <WG1684> into <WG1519> a ship, <WG4143> and passed over, <WG1276> and <WG2532> came <WG2064> into <WG1519> his own <WG2398> city. <WG4172>

<WG1161> No man <WG3762> putteth <WG1911> a piece <WG1915> of new <WG46> cloth <WG4470> unto <WG1909> an old <WG3820> garment, <WG2440> for <WG1063> that which is put in to fill it up <WG4138> <WG846> taketh <WG142> from <WG575> the <WG3588> garment, <WG2440> and <WG2532> the rent <WG4978> is <WG1096> made worse. <WG5501>
